subjects_num.Description: Number of subjects with outputs in this derivative

sessions_num.Description: Total number of sessions with outputs, or 'n/a' if single-session

output_num.Description: Total number of output files in this derivative

output_size.Description: Total size of output files in this derivative

html_num.Description: Total number of HTML report files in this derivative

nifti_num.Description: Total number of NIfTI output files in this derivative

nifti_size.Description: Total size of NIfTI output files in this derivative

tool_name.Description: Name of the processing tool (e.g., fMRIPrep, MRIQC)
